# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Security fixes are provided for the latest released minor series.

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 1.x     | Yes       |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues by email to:

- me@aponysus.com

If you need an encrypted channel, include your PGP key in the email and we will
reply with our key.

### What to Include

- A clear description of the issue and impact.
- Steps to reproduce (proof-of-concept is helpful).
- Affected versions and environments.
- Any potential mitigations you are aware of.

We will acknowledge receipt within 72 hours and provide a timeline for triage
and remediation once validated.
